sentences.sentence: The electrogalvanizing zinc plate were greatly increased under the irradiation of an iodinetungsten lamp.
sentences.translation: 在碘化钠灯照射下，电镀锌钢板的厚度明显增加。

sentences.sentence: All of this drives advocates of irradiation crazy.
sentences.translation: 这都驱使着辐照杀菌愈来愈受主张。

sentences.sentence: Irradiation leaves no traces of radioactive material in food.
sentences.translation: 辐照会残留一些不明的放射性物质在食物里面。
